Chad Bustard is a data enthusiast and machine learning practicioner leveraging large-scale simulations,
 Python-based data analysis, and a start-up mindset to solve novel problems in astrophysics. He's now adapting and 
 growing his technical skillset to tackle climate change.  

## Education

University of Wisconsin-Madison | PhD in Physics | June 2014 - August 2020

Rice University | B.S. in Astrophysics, B.A. in Mathematics | August 2009 - May 2013
